summary: This document is an email from Assistant United States Attorney Jeff Pagliuca to defense counsel regarding proposed redactions to a Rule 17(c) motion for a subpoena in the Southern District of New York. It includes attachments related to the motion and demonstrates ongoing legal proceedings in the case.

persons.name: Jeff Pagliuca
persons.context: Sends an email to defense counsel with proposed redactions to a Rule 17(c) motion for a subpoena.

events.title: Email regarding proposed redactions to Rule 17(c) motion
events.description: Assistant United States Attorney Jeff Pagliuca sends an email to defense counsel with proposed redactions to a motion for a Rule 17(c) subpoena.

locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeff Pagliuca, an Assistant United States Attorney, is corresponding with defense counsel about proposed redactions to a Rule 17(c) motion.
The correspondence is dated November 21, 2021, indicating ongoing legal activity in the case at that time.
The email includes attachments related to a motion for a subpoena under Federal Rule of Criminal Procedure 17(c).
The communication originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
